overview: Zhao Shasha, the daughter of the town hotel, is a billiard genius. The grassroots male Liu Hongyang, who fled to follow the technical school graduation, went to Beijing. By chance, he got the favor of the billiard agent Abu, and opened the journey of professional billiard players. In the process, her relationship with Abu was frustrated, and her ugly Liu Hongyang was always with her. When the billiard goddess met her love, she would choose the quiet grassroots man who was silently waiting, or the sun-loving Gao Fushuai?
title: Sasha
